verses.text: And it came to pass, when Jabin king of Hazor had heard \add those things\add*, that he sent to Jobab king of Madon , and to the king of Shimron , and to the king of Achshaph ,
And to the kings that \add were\add* on the north of the mountains , and of the plains south of Chinneroth , and in the valley , and in the borders of Dor on the west ,

\add And to\add* the Canaanite on the east and on the west , and \add to\add* the Amorite , and the Hittite , and the Perizzite , and the Jebusite in the mountains , and \add to\add* the Hivite under Hermon in the land of Mizpeh.
And they went out , they and all their hosts with them, much people , even as the sand that \add is\add* upon the sea shore in multitude , with horses and chariots very many.
And when all these kings were met together , they came and pitched together at the waters of Merom , to fight against Israel.\f + \fr 11.5 \ft met…: Heb. assembled by appointment\f* \p

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* said unto Joshua , Be not afraid because of them: for to morrow about this time will I deliver them up all slain before Israel : thou shalt hough their horses , and burn their chariots with fire.
So Joshua came , and all the people of war with him, against them by the waters of Merom suddenly ; and they fell upon them.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* delivered them into the hand of Israel , who smote them, and chased them unto great Zidon , and unto Misrephoth-maim , and unto the valley of Mizpeh eastward ; and they smote them, until they left them none remaining.\f + \fr 11.8 \ft great Zidon: or, Zidonrabbah\f*\f + \fr 11.8 \ft Misrephoth-maim: or, Salt pits: Heb. Burnings of waters\f*
And Joshua did unto them as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* bade him: he houghed their horses , and burnt their chariots with fire. \p
¶ And Joshua at that time turned back , and took Hazor , and smote the king thereof with the sword : for Hazor beforetime was the head of all those kingdoms.

And they smote all the souls that \add were\add* therein with the edge of the sword , utterly destroying \add them:\add* there was not any left to breathe : and he burnt Hazor with fire.\f + \fr 11.11 \ft any…: Heb. any breath\f*

And all the cities of those kings , and all the kings of them, did Joshua take , and smote them with the edge of the sword , \add and\add* he utterly destroyed them, as Moses the servant of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* commanded.
But \add as for\add* the cities that stood still in their strength , Israel burned none of them, save Hazor only; \add that\add* did Joshua burn.\f + \fr 11.13 \ft in their…: Heb. on their heap\f*

And all the spoil of these cities , and the cattle , the children of Israel took for a prey unto themselves; but every man they smote with the edge of the sword , until they had destroyed them, neither left they any to breathe. \p

¶ As the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* commanded Moses his servant , so did Moses command Joshua , and so did Joshua ; he left nothing undone of all that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* commanded Moses.  +  r 11.15  t left…: Heb. removed nothing *
So Joshua took all that land , the hills , and all the south country , and all the land of Goshen , and the valley , and the plain , and the mountain of Israel , and the valley of the same;

\add Even\add* from the mount Halak , that goeth up to Seir , even unto Baal-gad in the valley of Lebanon under mount Hermon : and all their kings he took , and smote them, and slew them.\f + \fr 11.17 \ft the mount…: or, the smooth mountain\f*
Joshua made war a long time with all those kings.
There was not a city that made peace with the children of Israel , save the Hivites the inhabitants of Gibeon : all \add other\add* they took in battle.

For it was of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* to harden their hearts , that they should come against Israel in battle , that he might destroy them utterly , \add and\add* that they might have no favour , but that he might destroy them, as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* commanded Moses. \p

¶ And at that time came Joshua , and cut off the Anakims from the mountains , from Hebron , from Debir , from Anab , and from all the mountains of Judah , and from all the mountains of Israel : Joshua destroyed them utterly with their cities.
There was none of the Anakims left in the land of the children of Israel : only in Gaza , in Gath , and in Ashdod , there remained.

So Joshua took the whole land , according to all that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* said unto Moses ; and Joshua gave it for an inheritance unto Israel according to their divisions by their tribes. And the land rested from war.
